Class MatrixFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math.MatrixFactory

  • public class MatrixFactory
extends Object
    Creates Mat4 instances for projection- and ortho projection.

    void

        right - right
        top - top
        bottom - bottom
        zNear - z near value (for example 1)
        zFar - z far value (for example 10000)
